{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$3.0M in 2021-2022** on contracts with TANKATEK.

Across 50 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 6 have at least one amendment (12%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 15% and the average number of amendments was 1.5. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$14.1K over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 0.38 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$205.5K. The longest contract was 1.12 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$3.6M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}

{{< details summary="See original contracts and amendments" panel_body_class="vendor-names-list" >}}
- [TANKATEK](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22TANKATEK%22)
- [Tankatek](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22Tankatek%22)
{{< /details >}}
